title: More precise data processing needed for disk sorting with border value for row value
OB: When sorting on disk, if sorting 40000 rows of data and setting the program to process data less than 40000, the program follows these steps:
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Save the file as a temp file
2. Load the file into memory
3. Sort the data
4. Save the sorted data to a temp file
